name: Top Truck Free
description:
Ever dreamed of crushing cars in a bad boy monster truck? Now you can in Top Truck! Race across 3 distinct worlds in crazy settings. Send the crowd to fever pitch as you crush cars, destroy terrain & grab bonus points!  Search for hidden routes within the levels to finish in style, and enjoy some barnstorming loop-the-loops!


---------------
FEATURES
---------------
o Race through the ARENA before getting lost in the JUNGLE and stranded in the SNOW!


o Countless crazy, kooky and kickass levels!

o Massive levels means there is room for loads of different hidden paths. Can you find them all?

o Check out our very own CROWDOMETER to measure just how HYPED or booored the crowd is. Keep CRUSHING CARS and HOUSES to keep them wowed!

o Play with either the ACCELEROMETER (TILT) or the SLIDER
